TopicTitle: I need a good IVA mod that is like a real cockpit anyone know of one?

Articles.Content: So I bought a cool flightstick and I want a mod that Has a good IVA interior for 1.2. Or if a new IVA mod is coming out i would like to know. Please respond ASAP
the aset stuff is pretty much the platinum standard. raster prop monito, aset avionics etc.... not sure about it working in 1.2 yet though
Moved this over to Add-on Discussions, the 1.2 Modding Forum is for modders working on updating their mods.
